lead_paragraph: WALLER--Allen C, 96, of Rye, NY and The Ocean Reef Club, Key Largo, FL passed away on May 24th. Loving and devoted husband of Gladys for almost 64 years. Beloved father of Richard "Cass", daughter-in-law Jill, and the late Robert. Cherished grandfather of Jamie, Dana, Tracy and Gregory. Funeral services will be held at 11:00am on Friday, May 27th - Westchester Reform Temple, 255 Mamaroneck Rd, Scarsdale, NY. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made in his memory to The American Cancer Society 132 W. 32nd Street, NY, NY 10001 Attn: Jackie Walsh. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WALLER, ALLEN C
